episodes.title: 67 – The Kurim Case
episodes.description: It's spooky season so it's getting dark. This week Sam recounts the harrowing story of the Kurim case, a horrific child abuse scandal that emerged in the Czech Republic in 2007. This gripping story unveiled a clandestine cult shrouded in manipulation and cruelty, as well as the shocking revelation of a 33-year-old woman who was ...hiding a secret. The case first came to light in May 2007 when a man in Kurim inadvertently intercepted his neighbor's baby monitor signal. What he witnessed was nothing short of horrifying: unsettling images of a naked and bound young boy named Ondrej, imprisoned in a cupboard. Visit us on Linktree for all our links, Instagram, or email us at jeffandsamshow@gmail.com. Show Sources: Mother, aunt, mysterious woman, girl, boy sentenced in Brno child abuse case – Radio Prague International The Kurim Case: A Terrifying True Story of Child Abuse, Cults & Cannibalism – Ryan Green Case 223: The Kurim Case – Casefile Podcast
